name: Scientist Game
description:
How to play:

You're a mad scientist that create evil monsters. Now the  monsters have managed to break free and are on the loose in your facility. Fortunately you can use your viles that you've scattered around the place to craft weapons. To create a weapon, pick up three viles and use them at a factory. You will get different weapons depending on what viles you pick up. Use teleporters around the facility to maneuver the enemies and earn as high of a score as you can. The more enemies you defeat at once, the more score you will get. If you want to you can post your highscore in the comments.

Good luck!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move left and right
  • Down arrow key to interact (aka pick up viles, use teleporters and craft weapons at the factory)
  • Z to shoot
  • X to check current viles
  • C to use emergency bomb
